name: Space Shooter Z
description:
Welcome to the Space Shooter Z Project!

I've been working on this project for about year on and off as a hobby.

That being said there is still much to do and much to consider as far as enhancements, so feel free to provide any and all feedback that you can,  and I would be more than happy to try and implement them. 
Of course you can expect to find your names in the credits for all ideas that you contribute. Thanks again,
and enjoy!

Game Description:
The premise is simple survive... and get the highest score! This is a classic arcade space shooter, nothing more nothing less. Accept the challenge if you dare! hahaha *cough* *cough*

Controls:

Move Ship:
S = Left
D = Right

Alternative:
Left Arrow Key 
Right Arrow Key

Shoot Lasers:
J = Shoot

Alternative:
Space = Shoot

Xbox 360 and Xbox ONE Gamepads are Compatible
D-pad Left/Right = Move Ship
Left Analog Stick Left/Right = Move Ship
X Button = Shoot
A Button = Shoot

Please send all feedback and bug reports to the following email address:
snoleyproductions@gmail.com
